shape_2_per_frame6=//g2=1-q6;
shape_2_per_frame7=//x=x-(int(q1*10)*0.05);
shape_2_per_frame8=rad = rad+0.09*q1;

shapecode_3_border_g=0.000

per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.3) + 0.4*sin(0.98*time));
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.1) + 0.4*sin(0.78*time));
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.2) + 0.4*sin(0.6*time));
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=q8=wave_r;
per_frame_7=q7=wave_b;
per_frame_8=q6=wave_g;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=wr = 0.5+0.3*(0.6*sin(time*1.8) + 0.4*sin(0.8*time));
per_frame_11=wb = 0.5+0.3*(0.6*sin(time*1.67) + 0.4*sin(0.5*time));
per_frame_12=wg = 0.5+0.3*(0.6*sin(time*1.92) + 0.4*sin(0.4*time));
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=q10=wr;
per_frame_15=q11=wb;
per_frame_16=q12=wg;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=vol = 0.1*(vol*9 + (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.333333);
per_frame_19=q1=vol;
per_frame_20=monitor=vol;
per_frame_21=mtime=mtime+vol*0.01;
per_frame_22=q2=mtime*0.25;
per_frame_23=wave_mystery = wave_mystery + 0.6*vol;
per_frame_24=sy=sy+vol*0.02;
per_frame_25=sx=sy;
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=cx = cx + 0.2*sin(mtime);
per_frame_28=cy = cy - 0.2*sin(mtime*1.2);
per_pixel_1=rot=log(x+0.1)*(x+0.1);
per_pixel_2=rot=rot*0.1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, (uv)).xyz;
warp_6=`    float3 noise2 = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw+rand_frame.xy);
warp_7=`    noise2 *= 1.7*lerp(float3(q8,q7,q6), float3(q10,q11,q12), 1-rad); 
warp_8=`    ret += saturate(cross(ret, noise2));
warp_9=`    ret *= 0.9; 
warp_10=`    
warp_11=`
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv.xy).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret *= 1.49; //gamma
comp_5=`    
comp_6=`    ret *= ret; //darken
comp_7=`}
